title: Simon the Sorcerer 1 And 2 Android
description:
Simon The Sorcerer v1.0.1.8
Requirements: 2.3+
Overview: "DEFINITELY amongst the 10 BEST adventure games of ALL TIME" - ACG (Adventure Classic Gaming)

Simon the Sorcerer 2 v1.0.3.0 
Requirements: 2.3+
Overview: Following the success, media praises and high user ratings of the first game - Simon the Sorcerer (also available on Google Play), we proudly present its long-awaited sequel.

Instructions:

1.Install APK
2.EXTRACT RAR to 'sdcard/Android/Obb'
3.Launch the game
